snippet: A mob attacked gay people in a neighborhood in Abuja, Nigeria, beating them with whips and nail-studded clubs. When four victims were dragged to a nearby police station, police officers also beat them.
abstract: Mob drags more than dozen young men from their homes in Nigerian capital Abuja, and beats them while claiming to be cleansing community of homosexuals; police participate in assaults and no members of mob are arrested.
lead_paragraph: A mob attacked gay people in a neighborhood in Abuja, Nigeria, beating them with whips and nail-studded clubs. When four victims were dragged to a nearby police station, police officers also beat them.

headline.main: Mob Attacks More Than a Dozen Gay Men in Nigeria’s Capital
headline.print_headline: Mob Attacks More Than a Dozen Gay Men in Nigeria’s Capital
